title: Productive Failure-Based Linear Algebra Problem-Solving Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Linear Algebra (Matrix Operations, Vector Spaces, Linear Transformations)
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops); project-based assessments measure conceptual application abilities

learning_goals: Learners must explain problem-solving steps according to productive failure principles with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners must compare at least three student-generated solutions by team and derive key concepts
In the final project, learners must present solutions that apply linear algebra theories to real-world problems with 70% or higher applicability
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
